title: Compare Spiral Jetty and Serpent Mound-content

content.prompt: All of the following are similarities of both the Great Serpent Mound and Spiral Jetty EXCEPT that they

choices.label: were created by reworking materials present at the site

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
